hero.headline: AI Product Leader & Multi-time Founder
hero.subheadline: 7+ Years Scaling AI Solutions from 0-1 | Enterprise Clients Across MENA & Southeast Asia

about.title: About Hamza
about.summary: Transforming AI concepts into enterprise solutions across diverse markets
about.competencies:
erom erom With over 7 years of experience spanning the MENA region and Southeast Asia, I specialize in transforming complex AI concepts into scalable enterprise solutions. My journey began in fintech, where I discovered the power of AI to solve real-world regulatory challenges.

At Tapway, I led the development of enterprise AI vision platforms, scaling from startup to serving 10+ major enterprise clients. This experience taught me that successful AI products require not just technical sophistication, but deep understanding of enterprise needs and cultural contexts.

Currently, as an Entrepreneur in Residence at Antler Malaysia, I'm building AI compliance solutions for the fintech sector, having secured $110K+ in early funding. My focus remains on creating AI products that are both technically robust and culturally intelligent.
about.philosophyQuote: dnifInnovation thrives when we combine technical excellence with deep market understanding. True AI leadership means building products that are not just technically sophisticated but culturally intelligent. AI product success isn't just about cutting-edge technologyâ€”it's about understanding cultural nuances, regulatory landscapes, and human needs across diverse markets. True innovation happens when we bridge technical excellence with deep market empathy.
